mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa
Class Nimbus

java.lang.Object
  mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.Nimbus
public final class Nimbus
extends Object

The Nimbus of an Entity contains all information about its roles as a server.

Nimbus

Method Detail

addConnectionToClient

final ServerSideFSM addConnectionToClient(P2PChannel cc)
Add a serverside FSM to this Nimbus on behest of the arrival of a new client. The P2PChannel cc has been obtained by the P2PChannelFactory. After this method call, a new serverside FSM has been installed in the Nimbus, which manages all data on the P2PChannel cc.

Parameters:
cc - the P2PChannel
Returns:
the ServerSideFSM mamnaging the connection to the new client

removeConnectionToClient

final void removeConnectionToClient(ServerSideFSM fsm)
Remove a serverside FSM from this Nimbus because of the departure of a client. Before this method is called, the ServerSideFSM fsm was obtained from this Nimbus by calling addClient. After this method is called, the ServerSideFSM fsm is removed from this/ Nimbus. If theProjector associated with fsm has no more clients then it is removed from this Nimbus.

Parameters:
fsm - the FSM managing the connection to the Client

buildSelectableSet

void buildSelectableSet(SelectableSet ss)
Allow the FSMs to add their P2PChannels to the SelectableSet

Parameters:
ss - the SelectableSet

getProjector

final Projector getProjector(QoS qos)
Get a Projector for a specified QoS, making a new/ Projector if needed. A Projector is returned (newly made if necessary) which can project fields as specified in qos. Null is returned if the QoS contains anything other than Class objects.

Parameters:
qos - the desired QoS for the Projector
Returns:
the Projector

addProjector

final void addProjector(QoS key,
                        Projector p)
Add a Projector to the Nimbus for a specified QoS

Parameters:
key - the QoS
p - the Projector

nextLocalUID

final int nextLocalUID()
Get another local UID for use in the Nimbus

Returns:
the next available UID
